long_desc.thetext:
behavior -> behaviour: - 6.1.7.3 Invariants of the Essential Internal Methods, 2nd paragraph - 7.5.2 PromiseBuiltinCapability, NOTE - 7.5.3 PromiseOf, NOTE - 25.4.3.1 Promise, last paragraph - 26.3.3.18.5 Loader.prototype.instantiate, 3rd paragraph
initialize -> initialise: - 8.2.1 CreateRealm, step 2 - 19.1.1 The Object Constructor, NOTE - 25.4.1.5 NewPromiseCapability, 1st paragraph - 26.3.4 Properties of %Loader% Instances, 1st paragraph - 26.3.5.1 CreateLoaderIterator, step 1 - 26.5.1.2 new Proxy, 1st paragraph
normalize -> normalise: - 6.1.4 The String Type, 2nd paragraph - 11.6.1.1 Early Errors, NOTE - 11.8.6.1 TV’s and TRV’s, NOTE - 15.2.3.1, Table 33, "meaning" column for [[Modules]] - 15.2.3.2, Table 34, "meaning" column for [[Name]] and [[Dependencies]] - 15.2.3.2.1 CreateLoad, 1st paragraph - 15.2.4.2 RequestLoad, 1st paragraph, 3rd paragraph - 15.2.4.7.1 AsyncStartLoadPartwayThrough, 1st paragraph - 26.3.3.6 Loader.prototype.get, 1st paragraph - 26.3.3.18.2 Loader.prototype.locate, 2nd paragraph
